We should document a function¶

This function takes in a number and returns a number with 2 added

param num

The input number

returns

Result

And then we have some other stuff

We can document a Class¶

class a_module.people.Person(name)¶

A Person Class contains a name

greeting()¶

Saying hello is important

We can document a Subclass with inherited methods¶

class a_module.people.Farmer(name, crop)¶

A Farmer is an important member of society, and is a Person. All Farmers are Persons.

greeting()¶

Saying hello is important

grow_crop()¶

I tell you the crops i grow

We can document a Subclass without inherited methods¶

class a_module.people.Farmer(name, crop)¶

A Farmer is an important member of society, and is a Person. All Farmers are Persons.

grow_crop()¶

I tell you the crops i grow
